page.title: 11DISABLED WOMAN 40+
page.content: Lived in Portchester for 27 years. Her main problem is her inability to walk. Being physically handicapped and confined to a wheelchair she is denied access to certain buildings and the use of some forms of transport. National problems are: Unemployment, cuts in public services, deterioration of moral standards, behaviour problems eg violence, drugs and polution. Her solutions are: More discipline, greater understanding on the part of the government about the problems of living, more employment opportunities by lowering the pension age and finally, more work experience for school leavers.
